titles: A pair of spectacles for this purblinde nation with which they may see the Army and Parliaments like Simeon and Levi brethren in iniquity walk hand in hand together. Or A perspective to take a view of the Army, and Parliaments political combination in betraying their countryes priveledges. By H.M a true friend to this nations liberties.
author: H. M.
notes: Title page printed in red and black.
Variant has "to take a view of the army, and parliaments" in title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Army --  Early works to 1800.
England and Wales. --  Parliament --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
